name: Monirul Islam
bio: Chef Monirul Islam is a renowned chef from Dhaka, Bangladesh. He has over 20 years of experience in cooking traditional Bangladeshi cuisine and has won multiple awards for his culinary skills. He is known for his expertise in preparing Kacchi Biriyani and Shorshe Ilish.

name: Mawa Begum
bio: Chef Mawa Begum is a rising star in the culinary world. She is a graduate of the Culinary Institute of Bangladesh and has been working as a professional chef for over 10 years. She is known for her expertise in preparing Bhuna Khichuri and Beef Kala Bhuna.

name: Shawkat Osman
bio: Chef Shawkat Osman is a highly skilled chef from Chittagong, Bangladesh. He has been in the culinary industry for over 15 years and has a passion for creating unique and flavorful dishes. He is known for his expertise in preparing Fuchka and Bhorta.

name: Khairul Alam
bio: Chef Monirul Islam is a renowned chef from Dhaka, Bangladesh. He has over 12 years of experience in cooking traditional Bangladeshi cuisine and has won multiple awards for his culinary skills. He is known for his expertise in preparing Kacchi Biriyani and Shorshe Ilish.
